title: An Act relative to establishing a workforce training trust fund for emerging technologies

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Diggs of Barnstable, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 3983) of Kip A. Diggs for legislation to establish a workforce training trust fund for emerging technologies.  Economic Development and Emerging Technologies.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Economic Development and Emerging Technologies

related_entities.name: committee on Economic Development and Emerging Technologies

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 09/25/2025 from 11:00 AM-01:00 PM in A-1

Hearing rescheduled to 09/25/2025 from 11:00 AM-11:30 AM in A-1                                                                                                                  and Virtual Hearing updated to New End Time
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on House Ways and Means

related_entities.name: the committee on House Ways and Means
committee on House Ways and Means
